metadata.title: CVE-2019-8842 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking. This issueis fixed in macOS Catalina 10.15.2, Security Update 2019-002 Mojave, andSecurity Update 2019-007 High Sierra. In certain configurations, a remoteattacker may be able to submit arbitrary print jobs.

criterions.comment: cups: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
